Package tables

Class Table.Reservation

  • Object
    • Reservation
  • Enclosing class:
    Table
    class Table.Reservation
extends Object
    Reservation entity attached to the table.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int contact
      Contact number of the person making the reservation.
      private LocalDateTime date
      Date/time of reservation.
      private String name
      Name of the person making the reservation.
      private int pax
      No.

      Retrieves the session information string of the reservation date.

                    String name,
                    LocalDateTime date,
                    int pax)
        Creates a new reservation with the specified parameters.

        name - Name of the person making the reservation.
        date - Date/time of reservation.
        pax - No. of pax reserved for.

        Retrieves the date/time of the reservation in a more readable string format.
        Returns:
        Date/time of reservation in string format.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Retrieves the name of the person who made the reservation.
        Returns:
        Name of person.

      • getTableId

        int getTableId()
        Retrieves the table ID which the reservation is attached to.
        Returns:
        Table ID attached to.

      • getPax

        int getPax()
        Retrieves the no. of pax the reservation is made for.
        Returns:
        No. of pax reserved for.

      • isExpired

        boolean isExpired()
        Checks if the reservation has lapsed for over 30 minutes since the reservation time.
        Returns:
        True / False

      • isCurrentSession

        boolean isCurrentSession()
        Checks if the reservation is of the current restaurant session.
        Returns:
        True / False

      • matchContact

        boolean matchContact​(int contact)
        Checks if the specified contact matches.
        Parameters:
        contact - Contact to check against.
        Returns:
        True / False

      • isArrivalWindow

        boolean isArrivalWindow()
        Checks if the reservation is in its arrival window. Arrival window is any time in the current session, since a table is reserved for the entire session, and before the expiry time.
        Returns:
        True / False

      • getSessionString

        String getSessionString()
        Retrieves the session information string of the reservation date.
        Returns:
        Reservation session information string.
